Samsung SmartCam

Brief: Samsung SmartCam is a versatile app that allows users to transform their smartphones into a sophisticated security system. With live video streaming, event alarm notifications, H.264 format support, and two-way communication, Samsung SmartCam is an essential tool for monitoring and protecting your space. It ensures a seamless user experience across various network environments and compatible Samsung devices.
